title: Survive at all costs
subtitle: experince new social battle rayale game
question: What is sos?
extra_info: Each round, you and 15 other contestants compete to escape a deadly island filled with monsters. The trick is: three people can survive. Will you run solo or form friendships with others to escape?
extra_info2: Making the right decisions could be the difference between life and death.
extra_info_feature: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.
run_this_game: Can my computer run this game?
quote_extra_text: Our goal is to create a product and service that you’re satisfied with and use it every day. This is why we’re constantly working on our services to make it better every day and really listen to what our users has to say.
subscribe_extra_info: In order to start receiving our news, all you have to do is enter your email address. Everything else will be taken care of by us. We will send you emails containing information about game. We don’t spam.
